resources.string: This App requires WRITE_PERMISSION to read and modify PDFs.

1. Press + button to add PDF files whose watermark you want to remove.
2. After adding PDF files, press Modify PDF button to remove CamScanner watermark from PDFs.

Note: All the PDFs are stored in documents/WatermarkRemover folder.
Do you want to view processed files?\nNote: All files are stored in documents/WatermarkRemover
Press + button to add PDF files
